role.argrole: description Arg0 can be described as

example.parse: ( (IP (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (NP-PN (NR 普京)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 时隔) (QP-EXT (CD 五) (CLP (M 年))))) (DEC 的))) (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 访) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 日)))) (DEC 之)) (NP (NN 行))) (VP (VV 得以) (NP-OBJ (NN 实现)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 可谓) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 一波三折)))) (PU 。)))
